question:
[Mark] invited his father [Spencer] and his brother [Peter] to go on a weekend fishing trip. [Philip] went to the bakery with his uncle [Spencer] to pick up some bread for lunch. [Carmelita] loves cooking for her son. His name is [Reynaldo] [Peter] asked his brother, [Mark], if he wanted to go to the beach. [Mark] said he could n't go because he had to take [Brandi], his sister, to see the dentist. [Reynaldo] 'son, [Philip], aced his math class and made his father proud.
Question: How is [Brandi] related to [Carmelita]?

- [Philip] (son of [Carmelita], nephew of [Spencer])
- [Carmelita] (mother of [Mark] and [Philip])

- [Brandi] (sister of [Mark], daughter of [Carmelita])

Step 2: Trace the relationship between [Brandi] and [Carmelita]:
- [Brandi] is the sister of [Mark].
- [Mark] is the son of [Carmelita].
- Therefore, [Brandi] is the daughter of [Carmelita].

Step 3: Explain the relationship:
- [Brandi] is the daughter of [Carmelita], so they are mother and daughter.
